extension.description:
Sellacious Backoffice

The sellacious backoffice is where you can manage the shop, products, sellers and all related settings.
By default the Backoffice is installed at http://example.com/sellacious. However, you can always rename this directory under your Joomla site root.
Important: After you rename the backoffice directory you must open and login to the backoffice using the new name. Unless you do this, all other parts of the website may be non-functional.
For more help write us at: support@sellacious.com
